summary: Do memory supplements contain what they claim? We had three products tested. One product, marketed as Ginkgo biloba, did not contain that ingredient. Instead it contained an unknown substitute; as such the safety of the product is unknown. The second product was marketed as a supplement that included Ginkgo biloba. It also contained an unknown substitute, instead of Ginkgo biloba. The third product, marketed as...
title: Memory Supplements: Results of Testing for Selected Supplements
